title: Government & Geographic collection closed; paging available: Libraries - Northwestern University
content: Beginning Monday,  June 17, the Government & Geographic Information Collection stacks will be temporarily closed for work to be completed in lower-level room B190. During this period, materials can be requested and paged for use using NUsearch. Work is expected to be completed on Monday, June 24. Government & Geographic Information Collection houses materials produced by the U.S. Federal government, the State of Illinois, the City of Chicago, and several international government agencies, as well as an extensive collection of maps. If you need help locating items in NUsearch, please call 847-467-6441 or email govinfo@northwestern.edu to reach Government Information staff.
